```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(foreign)
bfat = read.dbf("new_bfat.dbf")
abdomen=bfat$abdomen
per_fat = bfat$per_fat
hist(abdomen)
hist(per_fat)

# Box Cox transformation
library(MASS)
boxcox(abdomen ~ per_fat, lambda=seq(-2, 2, length=100))
```
